author: Lyzza
title: Sweden school killings: Attacker 'had racist motives'
text: Quote: Originally Posted by Todesengel And you are seriously twisted for defending muslims who would love nothing more than to rape and oppress women. Hell, you claim that your a feminist but defend rapists simply because their muslim. Sweden has the second highest rape count in the entire world solely because of muslims. They are being invaded, raped, and oppressed by the socialist gov't and they have the right to take it back. Oh my god, you are s much more twisted and insane then I originally thought. Check out your facts here, guy. Go read about Sweden and their three categories of rape. Defending rapists because of their superstitious beliefs? I don't think so. You really need to pull your head out of your ass, stop telling me who I am and what I believe/say (especially when it is NOT true in the slightest) and stick to the issue in the thread. None of that BS you are babbling about has anything to do with this attack, though. This bullshit fear mongering, racist crap you are spreading here doesn't pass the sniff test, at all. Again, get a grip.
